text: ning daembi aoy banda anak del trauv ban ke phdal chamnehvichchea doeng chbasa tha pitabrakd nasa vea chea karpit del mk pi mcheasa robsa anak ning daembi aoy puokke mean chomnue nung vea haeyning daembi aoy chetd robsa puokke nungonr champoh vea . haey pitabrakd nasa a l laoh kuchea anak changaoul bangheanh dl banda anak del mean chomnue towkean meakra da troemotrauv
